docs.lead_paragraph: HE stock market has been so volatile, so scary, over the last 18 months that you'd think it would have tossed off investors the way a dog shakes off water after a bath. After all, the market took a huge dip in October 1997, and right around the time investors were panicking, it came back, only to retreat this past August and then roar back again.
docs.abstract: James Schembari (Midstream) column on increased jitters among individual investors about stock market investments since October dip; drawing (M)
